title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: I developed Tic Tac Toe game using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. The game allows two players to compete against each other. This project helped me enhance my skills in web development and game logic implementation.

title: Real-Estate Website
description: I created a responsive real estate website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This project allowed me to apply my web development skills while creating a practical solution for real estate needs.

title: Binary-Sum
description: I developed a C++ program that sums two binary numbers. The program accepts user input for both binary values, and outputs the result in binary format. This project enhanced my understanding of C++ programming concepts.
